page.title: 08An Eckington Mum part2.
page.content: Next we delivered a birthday card and a get well card. When we got home we had a drink and the chilren played on the organ again. I started to make dinner 4.45 and the kids went outside to play. I had a go on the organ. 5.15 T.V. man came to repair the television. I tidied up. T.V. man went, Jessica went, Nils came home and kids came in plastered in mud. Emily took Nils to inspect the large 'Hole-in-the-road'. We had tea and Emily went to bed. Nils and I played on the organ. Lookedfor library booksdue back tomorrow. Scrubbed mud from back doorstep. 8.30 Nick went to bed. I wrote report for PPA meeting. Sat with Emily, who had a cough, for half an hour. 10.30 Had a drink and read a paper. Then I went to bed.
